name: part_007
file: tmp_【 チラ見せ】大神ミオ 1st Live.「Our Sparkle」ぴあアリーナMM [pChQkIDyOJA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Howling' with a dramatic red light show and fiery visuals.
MC section where Ookami Mio interacts with the audience, encouraging them before the next song.
Performance of the song 'Night Loop' (Yako) featuring a blue, crystalline stage set and laser effects.

subtitles.original: 瞬きは 声なき月へ響く
subtitles.english: Blinkings echo towards the voiceless moon

subtitles.original: 爪弾く道 金銀の群れ
subtitles.english: The road I pluck, a golden and silver flock

subtitles.original: 共に嘆く夜
subtitles.english: The night we grieve together

subtitles.original: 遠く伝播する思いは 心強くする
subtitles.english: Thoughts propagating far away make my heart stronger

subtitles.original: 共に行こうよ 隣に君がいるから
subtitles.english: Let's go together, because you're by my side

subtitles.original: 私は迷わない
subtitles.english: I won't hesitate

subtitles.original: 光射す道へ
subtitles.english: Towards the path where light shines

subtitles.original: Listen to my howling
subtitles.english: Listen to my howling

subtitles.original: 大神が止まることはない
subtitles.english: Ookami will never stop

subtitles.original: まだまだ走るよー！
subtitles.english: We're still going!

subtitles.original: みんな、ついてきてー！
subtitles.english: Everyone, keep up!

subtitles.original: どこまで行こうか ねえ
subtitles.english: How far shall we go? Hey

subtitles.original: ベイビーな夜空に 映る昨日の自分
subtitles.english: In the baby night sky, my yesterday's self is reflected

subtitles.original: 夢見がちだった ベイビーフェイスにさよなら
subtitles.english: Saying goodbye to that dreamy baby face

subtitles.original: 見たくないもの照らす ハイビームに走る焦燥感
subtitles.english: Impatience running in the high beams that illuminate things I don't want to see

subtitles.original: 跳ね除ければいい 行けば
subtitles.english: Just brush it off, and as I go

subtitles.original: 信号は皆 色を失い消えた
subtitles.english: All signals lost their color and vanished

subtitles.original: 確かめたい 導き繋ぐ先を
subtitles.english: I want to make sure of where the guidance leads

subtitles.original: 深く深く紺になる
subtitles.english: Deeper and deeper into navy blue

subtitles.original: 夜を抜ける この加速度
subtitles.english: Passing through the night, this acceleration

subtitles.original: 光さえ超えていけるほどに
subtitles.english: To the point where I can even exceed light

subtitles.original: 強く強く踏み込んで
subtitles.english: Stepping in strongly, strongly

subtitles.original: 僕は駆ける ただ真っ直ぐに
subtitles.english: I run, just straight ahead

subtitles.original: 譲れない思いを抱いて
subtitles.english: Holding onto thoughts I cannot yield

subtitles.original: 標識だらけの街を 抜け出して
subtitles.english: Leaving the city full of signs

subtitles.original: 明日を探してた
subtitles.english: I was searching for tomorrow

subtitles.original: 常識も何も全部 複雑にしてた
subtitles.english: Common sense and everything were making things complicated

subtitles.original: どこまで行けるの？なんて
subtitles.english: How far can I go?

subtitles.original: 聞き飽きた台詞 吐いて
subtitles.english: Spitting out that phrase I'm tired of hearing

subtitles.original: 曇った窓ガラスに 書いた本音
subtitles.english: The true feelings I wrote on the cloudy window glass

subtitles.original: すぐに 指で消した
subtitles.english: I immediately erased with my finger

subtitles.original: 臆病でも揺るぎない 奇跡確かな願いを
subtitles.english: Even if I'm a coward, an unwavering miracle, a certain wish

subtitles.original: 胸に遥か遠く
subtitles.english: Deep in my heart, far away

subtitles.original: 錆び付くように軋んでも この真っ暗を灯し進めれば
subtitles.english: Even if it creaks as if rusting, if I light up this darkness and move forward

subtitles.original: ただ一つ答えを追いかけて
subtitles.english: Chasing just one answer

subtitles.original: 脆くてもいい この腕で
subtitles.english: It's okay to be fragile, with these arms

subtitles.original: 掴むために 手を伸ばすよ
subtitles.english: I'll reach out my hand to grab it

subtitles.original: 打ち鳴らす鼓動の限り
subtitles.english: As long as my heart beats

subtitles.original: 何度 この道で迷って
subtitles.english: How many times have I gotten lost on this road

subtitles.original: 見失ってどこへ行くの
subtitles.english: Losing my way, where am I going?

subtitles.original: 目指す場所もその意味も 一つしかないのに
subtitles.english: Even though there's only one place to aim for and one meaning for it

subtitles.original: 曇った視界は夜に溶けても もう一度開けていく
subtitles.english: Even if the cloudy vision melts into the night, it will open up once more

subtitles.original: 視線の先 僕を連れて行くよ きっと
subtitles.english: Beyond my gaze, it will surely take me there

subtitles.original: みんな、行くよー！
subtitles.english: Everyone, let's go!

subtitles.original: 深く深く紺になる
subtitles.english: Deeper and deeper into navy blue

subtitles.original: 息を吸って 今加速度を
subtitles.english: Taking a breath, now with acceleration

subtitles.original: 傷つくほどに強くなろう
subtitles.english: Let's become strong enough to get hurt

subtitles.original: 確かな色 動き出す
subtitles.english: A certain color starts to move

subtitles.original: まとっているその身体で
subtitles.english: With that body you're wearing

subtitles.original: 鮮やかな夜空の果てへ
subtitles.english: Towards the end of the vivid night sky

subtitles.original: 忘れないように
subtitles.english: So I don't forget

subtitles.original: 深く深く紺になれ 今を生きる この加速度
subtitles.english: Become deeper and deeper navy blue, living the now, this acceleration

subtitles.original: 光だって超えていける場所へ
subtitles.english: To a place where I can even exceed light

subtitles.original: 強く強く踏み込んで
subtitles.english: Stepping in strongly, strongly

subtitles.original: 僕を駆ける ただ真っ直ぐに
subtitles.english: I run through myself, just straight ahead

subtitles.original: 譲れない...
subtitles.english: Un-yieldable...
